item.title: Did you know that...? - some of the lesser known functionalities around GBIF.org
item.description: During the first-ever virtual GBIF 2021 Global Nodes Meeting, GBIFS hosted a “game show”: a one-hour “battle of Nodes vs. helpdesk”. The not-so-hidden goal was to demonstrate some of the lesser known functionalities of GBIF.org through a fun, interactive session.
